snippet: Police officers opened fire on a stolen sport utility vehicle early Monday near the Staten Island side of the Verrazano-Narrows Bridge during a search for a suspected carjacker, officials said.
abstract: MTA Bridges and Tunnels police officers in Staten Island fire on stolen sport utility vehicle during search for suspected carjacker Tyrell Brown, who escapes vehicle and flees into wooded area near the Verrazano-Narrows Bridge; female passenger is taken into custody for questioning and search continues for Brown.
lead_paragraph: Police officers opened fire on a stolen sport utility vehicle early Monday near the Staten Island side of the Verrazano-Narrows Bridge during a search for a suspected carjacker, officials said.

headline.main: Police Fire on Hummer as Suspect Flees on Staten Island
headline.print_headline: Police Fire on Hummer as Suspect Flees on S.I.
